equation:
\begin{equation}\la{met}
ds^2 = 2 dudv  + K(u,x) du^2 + 2 A_i(u,x) dx^i du\
+\  dx^i dx^i \ ,
\

\begin{equation} \la{sep}
K=  K_{ij}(u) x^i x^j  \ , \ \ \ \ \ \ \
K_{ii} =
 \four F_{ij} F_{ij} - \four H_{ij} H_{ij}  + 2 \partial^2_u \p
\ .
 \

\begin{equation}\la{mpw}
ds^2 = 2 dudv  + K_{ij}(u) x^i x^j  du^2 + F_{ij}(u) x^i  dx^j du\
+\  dx^i dx^i \ .
\

\begin{equation}\la{opw}
ds^2 = 2 dudv  + \td  K_{ij}(u) y^i y^j  du^2 +
dy^i dy^i \ ,
\

\begin{equation}   s'_{ab} + \td  K_{ij}  L^i_a  L^j_b +  L'^i_a  L'^i_b =0
\ , \ \ \ \ \
 s_{ab}  +  L^i_{(a} L'^i_{b)} =0 \ ,  \ \ {\rm i.e. } \ \ \
  L^{i}_a{}^{''} = \td  K_{ij}   L^j_a  \ . \

\begin{equation} \la{gs}
 L_F= i S_L (
\partial_- + {1 \ov 16} p_v H_{ij} \g^{ij} ) S_L + i S_R ( \partial_+
- {1 \ov 16} p_v  H_{ij} \g^{ij} ) S_R \ .
 \

\begin{equation} M_{ik}(\omega,n) = (\omega^2 + \kk_{i}-4
n^2)\delta_{ik} + 2 i \omega f_{ik} + 4 in h_{ik}\;\;.
\label{Mik}
\

\begin{equation} \la{hoh}
H=-\ha \partial_x^2  + V  \ , \ \ \ \ \ \
V = \ha [ (2 \ff  x - p_y)^2  -  \kk_1 x^2 ] \ .
\

\begin{equation} \la{popi}
V = \ha [ (2 \ff  x - p_y)^2  -  \kk_1 x^2 ]
=  (\ff  x - p_y)^2  -  \ha p_y^2  \  .
\

\begin{equation}\la{bbb}
{\cal A}^{n_1, n_2}= <n_1, n_2| U^+(\theta_1, \theta_2) d U(\theta_1, \theta_2) |n_1, n_2>+
<n_1, n_2| d |n_1, n_2>~.
\
